alert.note: Alert for Brown; Champaign; Clark; Clermont; Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Highland; Madison; Miami; Montgomery; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:17PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHERN CHAMPAIGN, NORTHEASTERN CLERMONT, NORTH CENTRAL BROWN, EASTERN WARREN, WESTERN FAYETTE, CLINTON, CLARK, GREENE, NORTHWESTERN HIGHLAND, EASTERN MONTGOMERY, SOUTHWESTERN MADISON AND SOUTHEASTERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 616 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Carlisle to 7 miles east of Milford, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dayton, Springfield, Kettering, Beavercreek, Huber Heights, Fairborn, Xenia, Wilmington, Bellbrook, Hillsboro, New Carlisle, Blanchester, Yellow Springs, Wright-Patterson Afb, Northridge, Cedarville, Waynesville, Sabina, Enon and Jamestown. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 37 and 69. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 32 and 68. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Champaign; Clark; Clermont; Clinton; Fayette; Greene; Highland; Madison; Miami; Montgomery; Warren
